title.narrative: Ecuador - Sustainable Family Farming Modernization Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to enhance incomes of small and medium sized farm households by supporting more productive and climate-smart use of land and water.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Creation of Provincial Articulation Roundtables (Schedule 2, Section I.A.3.) | Description :Creation ofProvincial Articulation Roundtables to screen requests of subprojects, evaluate eligibility and guarantee coordination betweenlocal stakeholders. The Provincial Articulation Roundtables should have participation of local stakeholders including the GADPs,NGOs, other MAGAP's Project and program representatives. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Effectiveness of the Co-financing Agreement AECID/GoE (Article IV, Section 4.01) | Description :The Co-financingDeadline for the effectiveness of the Co-financing Agreement for the US$ 20 million loan between the Spanish Cooperation (AECID)and the Republic of Ecuador is June 1, 2016 | Due Date :01-Jun-2016

Finance Agreement :Implementation of Project according operation manual (Schedule 2, Section I.A.2) | Description :The Borrowershall carry out the Project in accordance with a manual (the Operational Manual), satisfactory to the Bank, which shall include therules, methods, guidelines, standard documents and procedures for the carrying out of the relevant Parts of the Project. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Ministerial Accord for internal MAGAP's coordination (Sch. 2, Section I. I.A.4.) | Description :The Borrower,through MAGAP shall issue a Ministerial Accord in a manner acceptable to the Bank, for the purposes of articulating andcomplementing actions among the different MAGAP’s Agricultural Programs and the Project, and maximizing the impacts andsustainability of the different activities derived from said Programs | Due Date :07-Jun-2016
